FY2019 GLOBAL CITIZENSHIP ANNUAL REPORT
POLICIES0122  
Employment at age 18 or higher. 
We strictly prohibit child labor and will 
comply with all local minimum age laws 
and requirements and/or set a minimum 
employment age of 18, whichever sets 
the higher standard. 
Intern Program. We provide internship 
opportunities to college/polytechnic/
university students, who meet our 
minimum employment age of 18. This program provides interns an opportunity 
to undergo supervised practical 
development and gain real-world 
experiential learning that complements 
their education. Seagate does not 
offer any type of apprentice program. 
Additionally, Seagate does not hire 
student workers other than those that 
meet the criteria for the intern program. 
For additional information, visit Seagate’s 
Global Citizenship website.
Note: *Our labor standards in the Human Rights policy address the core ILO 
Labor Conventions No. 29, 87, 98, 100, 105, 111, 138 and 182.
